children.content: Headache ± fever ± meningismus; >4 wk and persistent?
Neurosurgical evaluation for biopsy, excision, or drainage of mass
Neutrophilic: brucellosis, Nocardia, actinomycosis, endemic fungi
Lymphocytic: lymphoma, sarcoid, connective tissue disease, Lyme disease, syphilis, tuberculosis, cryptococcus
Detailed history and physical examination; Basic laboratory tests (HIV, immunoglobulins)

Rash, arthritis, mucosal ulceration, uveitis? Behçet's syndrome, Sjögren's syndrome, SLE, sarcoid, Wegener's disease
Repeat LP for large-volume CSF sample for guided diagnostic studies
Consider causes of subacute or recurrent meningitis (e.g., enterovirus, HSV)
